lines.name: Yoke of Suffering

explicitModifiers.text: 30% reduced Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Enemies take (5-10)% increased Damage for each type of Ailment you have inflicted on them

lines.flavourText: Let the unrepentant be dragged ever downwards by the weight of their sins.

lines.name: Marylene's Fallacy

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
"Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast 
before every duel and every cast of the die." 
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Gluttony

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 30 Poacher's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
Trigger Level 30 Poacher's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy and have no Mark
You have Culling Strike against Cursed Enemies
Curse Enemies with Level 30 Poacher's Mark on Hit, which can apply to Hexproof Enemies
Culling Strike against Enemies Cursed with Poacher's Mark
(20-32) Life gained for each Cursed Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (20-32) Life per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
(10-16) Mana gained for each Cursed Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (10-14) Mana per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Take (100-200) Physical Damage when you use a Movement Skill
You have no Armour or Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
What started as a desire to feed
became a desire to learn...

lines.name: Hyrri's Truth

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-18) to (24-33) Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds (11-18) to (23-33) Cold Damage to Attacks
(0.8-1.16)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Precision has (100-120)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText: Strike true, strike hard, and leave no survivors to retaliate.

lines.name: The Ephemeral Bond

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've gained a Power Charge Recently
(1-2) to (36-48) Lightning Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
For how little time they had together,
their love was all the more powerful.

lines.name: Berek's Respite

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-30) to (10-60) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
When you Kill a Shocked Enemy, inflict an equivalent Shock on each nearby Enemy
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"With Flame licking at his heels
Berek berated the clouds
Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains
And Berek held on tight
As Fire screamed and steamed
And fled."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Night's Hold

implicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 23 Purity of Lightning Skill
0.5% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life
Grants Level 21 Purity of Elements Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Fire Skill
(20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
You can apply an additional Curse
0.5% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
0.5% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Chaos Damage
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 10 Blind
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 10 Cast when Stunned

lines.flavourText:
In the light of Solaris, the shadows cower and hide.
But every night they gather and grow,
and all but the strong and the stupid
seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.

lines.name: Warped Timepiece

explicitModifiers.text: 30% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(30-36)% increased total Recovery per second from Life, Mana, or Energy Shield Leech
30% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

lines.flavourText:
As you have lived, so you shall die 
forever trying to keep up with me. 
Your blood on these hands of mine
forever makes me the public enemy.

lines.name: Berek's Grip

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (1-84) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
(1-1.2)% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies
1% of Damage against Frozen Enemies Leeched as Life
1% of Damage Leeched as Energy Shield against Frozen Enemies
1% of Damage Leeched as Mana against Frozen Enemies
1% of Damage against Shocked Enemies Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
"Berek hid from Storm's lightning wrath
In the embrace of oblivious Frost
Repelled by ice, blinded by blizzards
Storm raged in vain
While Berek slept."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Tear of Purity

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 10 Purity of Elements Skill

lines.flavourText:
A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,
but I know better than most how quickly
Purity can succumb to Corruption.
How quickly water turns to blood.
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Call of the Brotherhood

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (40-60)% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have (100-120)% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

lines.name: Eye of Innocence

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Take (100-120) Fire Damage when you Ignite an Enemy
(2-2.4)% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life while Ignited

lines.flavourText:
"...and so He said: 'Let only the good meet my gaze'
and no eye met His. So He called down the cleansing flames
and let black smoke sweep the Sinners away."
- Book of Innocence

lines.name: Doryani's Invitation

explicitModifiers.text: (0.2-0.6)% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
(10-30)% chance to Shock during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"You can invite them but you can never be 
sure who will come knocking."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Cyclopean Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Frozen if Dexterity is higher than Intelligence
Cannot be Ignited if Strength is higher than Dexterity
Cannot be Shocked if Intelligence is higher than Strength
1% increased Damage per 5 of your lowest Attribute

lines.flavourText:
With the patience of a prowling lion,
the Shade watched the Scholar.

lines.name: Replica Karui Ward
lines.flavourText:
"In testing, Prototype #9 had no effect on fired arrows. However,
an unknown spell did destroy the entire firing chamber."

lines.name: Winterheart

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (10-24)% of Life per second while Frozen

lines.flavourText:
Those who dwell in the deep freeze
enjoy a special kind of madness.

lines.name: Berek's Pass

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-30) to (10-60) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"From Frost's ice-bound pass
Berek taunted and jeered
Until furious Flame scaled the mountain
Berek escaped through the thaw
And Frost's tortured moans."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Profane Proxy

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Left Ring Slot: Your Chilling Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
Left Ring Slot: Your Chilling Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Curse instead
Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Curse instead

lines.flavourText: The machines do not hate. They merely serve one who does.

lines.name: Ascent From Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: You have Phasing if Energy Shield Recharge has started Recently
6% chance to Dodge Attack Hits while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
A single step forward
Snap free from the prison
Reborn into freedom eternal

lines.name: Doedre's Damning

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse

lines.flavourText:
Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

lines.name: Ngamahu Tiki

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +100 to Evasion Rating while on Low Life
Regenerate 1% of Life per second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
Flames to guide the Great Spirit to the site of the dead,
and smoke to carry them into the sky.

lines.name: Bisco's Leash

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Rarity of Items found per 15 Rampage Kills

lines.flavourText:
You were always there, by my side,
whether we sat or played.
Our friendship was a joyful ride,
I wish you could have stayed.

lines.name: Fury Valve

explicitModifiers.text:
Modifiers to number of Projectiles instead apply
to the number of targets Projectiles Split towards

lines.flavourText: A single act of anger travels countless paths of destruction.

lines.name: The Highwayman

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
0.5% of Damage Leeched as Life while you have at least 5 total Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charges
Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
Total Recovery per second from Life Leech is Doubled

lines.flavourText: Somebody does have to get hurt.

lines.name: Rotblood Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy
Curse Auras from Socketed Skills also affect you
Socketed Curse Gems have 50% reduced Mana Reservation
Socketed Curse Gems have 50% reduced Reservation
Socketed Curse Gems have (50-80)% increased Reservation Efficiency
(20-24)% reduced Effect of Curses on you
(15-25)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Accept the infection, let it take hold.
Then carry it far and wide.

lines.name: Heartbound Loop

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
(350-420) Physical Damage taken on Minion Death

lines.flavourText:
When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

lines.name: The Taming

explicitModifiers.text: (10-24)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Freeze, Shock and Ignite on Enemy
(10-24)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Freeze, Shock or Ignite on Enemy
(5-12)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

(10-48)% increased Elemental Damage with Hits and Ailments for
each type of Elemental Ailment on Enemy
(15-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Moon after moon did Berek make fools
Of the great and Untamed Three
Until malice for a Brother
Slew the hatred of the Other
And Berek did hunt
Alone and free."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Soulthirst

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Soul Eater during any Flask Effect
Lose all Eaten Souls when you use a Flask
Lose Souls gained from Soul Eater when you use a Flask

lines.flavourText:
"They say a draught of fine spirits will ward off
the elements and promote a longer, merrier life.
I have found this to be true on all counts." 
- Zerphi of the Vaal

lines.name: Bloodboil

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-18) to (15-36) Fire Damage to Attacks
(45-75)% reduced Effect of Chill on you

lines.flavourText: Rage is a big part of courage.

lines.name: Blackheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-18) to (3-30) Chaos Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText: Fear is highly infectious.

lines.name: Perseverance

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Attack Damage per (200-300) of the lowest of Armour and Evasion Rating
(14-20)% chance to gain Fortify when you Stun an Enemy with Melee Damage
Melee Hits which Stun have (14-20)% chance to Fortify
You have Onslaught while you have Fortify

lines.flavourText:
"Some blows must be evaded. Some blows must be endured.
The trick is to tell them apart."
- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: Ventor's Gamble

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (1-18)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
(2-15)% reduced Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

lines.flavourText:
In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

lines.name: Blightwell

implicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 23 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Lightning Skill
Grants Level 21 Purity of Elements Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Ice Skill
0.5% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
(20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
0.5% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
0.5% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life
You can apply an additional Curse

explicitModifiers.text: (30-54)% slower start of Energy Shield Recharge during any Flask Effect
(150-452)% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
Long ago, the ocean was a puddle where a golden fish dwelt,
who lit the ocean from within and kept the water fresh.
When the sky burned, the fish dived deep,
never to return, and the waters turned sour.

lines.name: Siegebreaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have (5-6)% chance to Taunt on Hit with Attacks
Your Minions spread Caustic Ground on Death, dealing (20-24)% of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage per second

lines.flavourText: Poison the land and they'll have nothing to defend.

lines.name: Pyroshock Clasp

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Enemies Ignited by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Fire
Enemies Shocked by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Lightning

lines.flavourText: Teach a man to burn, and you'll be warm for the rest of his life.

lines.name: Andvarius

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: Danger is the price of wealth.

lines.name: Atziri's Foible

explicitModifiers.text: Items and Gems have (25-26)% reduced Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText:
The world is but a piece of parchment, blank and symmetric. 
We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White. 
The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same. 
-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

lines.name: Faminebind

explicitModifiers.text: Deals 50 Chaos Damage per second to nearby Enemies

lines.flavourText:
After the Great Fire, the land lay barren
and our forefathers grew weak.
Mother Gull took pity on them
and gave them grain and water.

lines.name: Ungil's Harmony

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage

lines.flavourText: Gentle anger, raging calm.

lines.name: Venopuncture

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks have (25-30)% chance to cause Bleeding
You are Chilled while you are Bleeding
Non-Chilled Enemies you inflict Bleeding on are Chilled
Bleeding Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
There is a way to survive the bite of an ice snake,
but few have the resolve to attempt it.

lines.name: Soulbound

explicitModifiers.text: Link Skills have (10-15)% increased Cast Speed
Link Skills have (10-15)% increased Skill Effect Duration
Linked Targets Cannot Die for 2 seconds after you Die
Lose no Experience when you die because a Linked target died

lines.flavourText:
"Slay my twin and I will inherit her wisdom.
Slay me and her life will be prolonged by my demise.
Our souls are eternally bound by the sacrifices we have made."
- High Priest Atazek

lines.name: Storm Secret

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Herald of Thunder also creates a storm when you Shock an Enemy
Herald of Thunder's Storms Hit Enemies with (30-50)% increased Frequency
Storms Hit Enemies with (30-50)% increased Frequency
Take (250-300) Lightning Damage when Herald of Thunder Hits an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Lightning lives in an endless circle.

lines.name: Dream Fragments

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Doryani stumbled into a realm of madness
And awoke its Master.

lines.name: Gifts from Above

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Consecrate when you deal a Critical Strike
Creates Consecrated Ground on Critical Strike
(40-60)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Enemies killed with a Critical Strike
50% increased Damage while on Consecrated Ground
+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while on Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: God blesses those who bless themselves.

lines.name: Le Heup of All

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Existence is infinite
A weave of the living and dead
Beyond the understanding
Of the many mortal threads

lines.name: Sidhebreath

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (0.2-0.24)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Minions convert 50% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage
Minions deal (5-36) to (11-70) additional Cold Damage
(10-18)% reduced Mana Cost of Minion Skills

lines.flavourText: The breath of life is yours to give.

lines.name: Malachai's Artifice

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(75-120)% to Fire Resistance when Socketed with a Red Gem
+(75-120)% to Cold Resistance when Socketed with a Green Gem
+(75-120)% to Lightning Resistance when Socketed with a Blue Gem

lines.flavourText:
When the wind blows, 
Know which way to bend
and watch the others break.

lines.name: The Ignomon

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-28) to (24-45) Fire Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: The light that reveals is the glare that blinds.

lines.name: Lori's Lantern

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (6-8)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
+(20-30)% to Chaos Resistance when on Low Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Low Life
Damage from Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
By its light, Lori led her young charges to safety 
and bound up their wounds. 
Her sword arm was iron, yet her heart gentle 
and proof against hate.

lines.name: Arn's Anguish

explicitModifiers.text: Modifiers to Minimum Endurance Charges instead apply to Minimum Brutal Charges
Maximum Brutal Charges is equal to Maximum Endurance Charges
Gain Brutal Charges instead of Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText: The tortured thinker is made heavier by the weight of his guilt.

lines.name: Umbilicus Immortalis

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Flasks do not apply to you
Flasks you Use apply to your Raised Zombies and Spectres
Flasks apply to your Raised Zombies and Spectres

lines.flavourText:
"The power of rebirth rivals that of immortality."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3

lines.name: Death Rush

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Adrenaline for 1 second on kill
Gain Adrenaline for (2-3) seconds on kill
(0.6-0.96)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You gain Onslaught for (2-4) seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText: To truly appreciate life you must be there when it ends

lines.name: Immortal Flesh

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: -(55-40) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
(40-48)% increased Armour while not Ignited, Frozen or Shocked

lines.flavourText:
"She begged the Earth to spare her Son;
Out of love the Earth agreed.
To the other Elements she did not speak
And out of spite They plotted."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Timeclasp

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (6-14)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
Temporal Chains has (30-59)% reduced Effect on you
(6-14)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

lines.flavourText:
"To us mere mortals, time is slippery. 
I'm just evening things out." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: The Primordial Chain

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to maximum number of Summoned Golems

lines.flavourText:
The leash of the lifegiver
binds in both directions.

lines.name: Extractor Mentis

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 5% chance to grant Onslaught to nearby Enemies on Kill
5% chance to grant Chaotic Might to nearby Enemies on Kill
5% chance to grant Unholy Might to nearby Enemies on Kill
(5-10)% chance to gain Onslaught for 10 seconds on Kill
(5-10)% chance to gain Chaotic Might for 10 seconds on Kill
(5-10)% chance to gain Unholy Might for 10 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
When slaughtered flesh falls silent,
the soul may yet scream on.

lines.name: Eye of Chayula

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Never blinking, always watching.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula}

lines.name: Karui Charge

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: For dead men require no answer.

lines.name: Ming's Heart

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (20-72)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Ming slew Tranquillity
Took Chaos for his wife
And on Her immortal finger
He placed his Heart

lines.name: Perandus Signet

explicitModifiers.text: (2-3)% increased Intelligence for each Unique Item Equipped
3% chance for Slain monsters to drop an additional Scroll of Wisdom
3% additional chance for Slain monsters to drop Scrolls of Wisdom

lines.flavourText:
"Our warehouses are bursting. Our vaults are full.
But our minds are still hungry."
- Medici Perandus, Prefect to the Treasury

lines.name: Voidheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-15) to (3-28) Chaos Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee
Melee Attacks have (30-60)% chance to cause Bleeding
Melee Attacks have (20-45)% chance to Poison on Hit

lines.flavourText: Nothing spreads fear faster than the unknown.

lines.name: Auxium

(10-20)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
(0.2-0.24)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Power Charge

lines.flavourText: As long as the soul is unfettered, so is the body.

lines.name: Chain of Endurance

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects (100-150) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
Regenerate 2% of Life per second for each different Ailment affecting you

lines.flavourText:
"A man confronted with sufficient adversity
may ascend to unprecedented heights
and triumph over his coddled rivals."
- Weylan the Ezomyte

lines.name: Carnage Heart

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 50% increased Recovery per second from Life Leech
(50-60)% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(1.2-2.38)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
Forged from the blood of countless wars, 
its thirst has only begun.

lines.name: Rigwald's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Summon Spectral Wolf on Kill
10% Chance to Trigger Level (10-18) Summon Spectral Wolf on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Within the heart of every man and woman
lies the soul of a ferocious beast.
If you cannot tame it, embrace it.

lines.name: Valyrium

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Stun Threshold is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText: They will rise and fall in fire and blood.

Right ring slot: You and your Minions take (30-80)% reduced Reflected Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
The portrait reflected his pain,
a pain that she could never see.

lines.name: Kikazaru

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (20-72)% reduced Effect of Curses on you
Regenerate (1-3.6) Life per second per Level

lines.flavourText: Hear no evil.

Adds (5-12) to (7-24) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Tasalio, God of Water,
to the chieftain Rakiata.
Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand
so that his warriors' axes might rise and fall like the waves.

lines.name: The Warden's Brand

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-18) to (25-60) Physical Damage to Attacks
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when you Stun an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"I don't always have a flame handy
when a fresh delinquent walks through our gates."
- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

lines.name: Meginord's Girdle

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-12) to (15-24) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Kaom's strength was rivaled only by
the great Meginord of the north.

lines.name: Pyre

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (40-120)% of Cold Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Ignited Enemies you hit are destroyed on Kill
Ignited Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed

lines.flavourText: Let winter come. It will only make my fire burn brighter.

lines.name: The Aylardex

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-12)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Power Charge
1% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life per Power Charge
40% reduced Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
Shackled fires dance about;
Might within from force without.

lines.name: The Magnate

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30)% to all Elemental Resistances while you have at least 200 Strength
10% chance to deal Double Damage while you have at least 200 Strength
5% chance to deal Triple Damage while you have at least 400 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Few men cast a longer shadow
 than the Great Meginord of the North.

lines.name: Bloodgrip

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (10-12) to (20-24) Physical Damage to Attacks
Moving while Bleeding doesn't cause you to take extra Damage

lines.flavourText:
Combat is simple.
Keep your blood in.
Take theirs out.

lines.name: Wurm's Molt

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-2.4)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(0.4-2.4)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
(500-1200)% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(500-1196)% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

lines.flavourText:
They say a lifetime of wisdom is carried
in every skin the great beasts shed.

lines.name: Belt of the Deceiver

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Chance to Block Attack and Spell Damage
You take 30% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText:
In battle, virtue matters not. 
Only victory.

lines.name: Shaper's Seed

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Allies gain (1-4)% of Life Regenerated per second
Nearby Allies gain (40-80)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

lines.flavourText: The first light to grow in the primordial darkness.

lines.name: Essence Worm

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

Socketed Gems have no Reservation
Your Blessing Skills are Disabled

lines.flavourText:
"This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.
Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
- Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Mokou's Embrace

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: All Damage Taken from Hits can Ignite you

lines.flavourText: Fire makes the perfect blossom in the endless night.

lines.name: Kaom's Sign

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(2-4) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (2-4) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
A token from the sea
A sign for Kaom
to lead his Karui to Wraeclast.

lines.name: Praxis

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: -(9-4) to Total Mana Cost of Skills
(8-9)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
(8-9)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

lines.flavourText:
The Thaumaturgical masters of the Eternal Empire,
as unpredictable and varied as they were,
all understood one thing:
Free thinking leads to free action.

lines.name: Gloomfang

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (0.5-0.6)% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life
Lose (10-15) Life for each Enemy hit by your Spells
Lose (10-15) Life per Enemy Hit with Spells
Lose (20-25) Life for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Lose (20-26) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Projectiles gain (15-24)% of Non-Chaos Damage as extra Chaos Damage per Chain
Projectiles that have Chained gain (20-42)% of Non-Chaos Damage as extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText: Darkness never stops feeding.

lines.name: Darkness Enthroned

explicitModifiers.text: (50-100)% increased Effect of Socketed Abyss Jewels

lines.flavourText:
Hold in your hand the darkness
and never will the light blind you.

lines.name: Ikiaho's Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Life Flasks used while on Low Life apply Recovery Instantly
Mana Flasks used while on Low Mana apply Recovery Instantly

lines.flavourText: Even the loneliest of souls can aid a friend in times of darkness.

lines.name: Perandus Blazon

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: -2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.

lines.name: Araku Tiki

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(100-250) to Evasion Rating while on Low Life
Gain Elusive on reaching Low Life
Regenerate (1-1.2)% of Life per second while on Low Life
You have Phasing while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
It is said to make you invisible when the Great
Spirit comes to take you on your final journey.

lines.name: Bated Breath

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: At knifepoint, a moment's hesitation means death.

lines.name: Voideye

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: The darker the eye, the more diligent the watched.

lines.name: Prismweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-19) to (7-38) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (2-14) to (5-33) Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to (13-81) Lightning Damage to Attacks
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills during any Flask Effect
(10-12)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as vivid as the rage of battle

lines.name: Daresso's Salute

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
+2 to Melee Weapon and Unarmed Attack range
(60-72)% increased Melee Damage when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
"A bit short in the arm, are you? 
Then you'll be short of a head soon enough."
- Daresso the Daring

lines.name: Karui Ward
lines.flavourText:
"Shoot first, ask no questions."
- Karui wisdom

lines.name: Thief's Torment

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-72) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (20-72) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
+(15-36) Mana gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (15-36) Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
(50-60)% reduced Effect of Curses on you

lines.flavourText:
The ring I stole,
My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.

lines.name: Valako's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: (15-40)% increased Damage with Hits against Shocked Enemies
(0.2-1.09)% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Valako,
appointing Kiloava as the Herald of War.
A title Kaom claimed when he ended Kiloava's bloodline.

lines.name: Victario's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
10% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
5% increased Projectile Speed per Frenzy Charge
5% increased Projectile Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Grind your words into sharp thoughts.
Grind your thoughts into the sharpest of deeds."
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Maligaro's Cruelty

explicitModifiers.text: (25-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by at least 5 Poisons
(12-15)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by fewer than 5 Poisons
(10-12)% increased Damage with Poison per Frenzy Charge
3% increased Poison Duration per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"He does not love. He does not feel regret or remorse.
He does not think about consequences, only possibilities.
If that does not describe a monster, tell me: what does?"
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Mark of Submission

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Socketed Curse Gem on Hit
Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit

lines.flavourText:
So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

lines.name: Ahkeli's Mountain
Icefang Orbit

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: You are Chilled when you are Poisoned
Non-Chilled Enemies you Poison are Chilled
Poisoned Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
Those members of the Brotherhood who employ the venom of 
Trarthan ice snakes must take great care with the volatile substance.

lines.name: Retaliation Charm

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
(25-40)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies
(30-50)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Blinded Enemies
(40-50)% chance to Blind Enemies on Critical Strike
Blind does not affect your Light Radius
(10-20)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Blinded
Blind you inflict is Reflected to you

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye.
